author: USA TODAY, Gary Dinges, USA TODAY
title: Paul McCartney, Elton John, Jennifer Lopez, others heap praise on health workers during 'One World: Together at Home'
description: 'One World: Together at Home,' the all-star celebration of healthcare workers during the coronavirus pandemic, kicked off with a six-hour livestream.
content:
This weekend, Global Citizen hosts an online music festival featuring Taylor Swift and more. Plus, John Krasinski will DJ a virtual prom on YouTube.
USA TODAY
"One World: Together at Home" leaned on scores of A-list celebrities to help spread some cheer dur… [+4840 chars]
